Report 4017_rep - 16/10/01 18:01 from workbench jmbdev (xxxxx)
------------

  RWStl.p (Updated) :  
----
    Modified  :  RWStl.cxx 1.2

  StlAPI.p (Updated) :  
----
    Modified  :  StlAPI.cxx 1.2
    Modified  :  StlAPI.cdl 1.2

  XSDRAWSTLVRML.p (Updated) :  
----
    Modified  :  XSDRAWSTLVRML.cxx 1.2
-- Author        : JMB
-- Study/CSR     : 
-- Debug         : 
-- Improvements  : Reading ascii and binary STL file correctly
-- News          : 
-- Deletions     : 
-- Impact        : 
-- Comments      : Modifications to be conform to STL specifications and platform-independent (portability).
-- Reading ascii STL file was not correct when reading STL files 
-- that came from NT on Unix-like platform. Reading binary STL file was wrong on Unix.
-- Adding portability between Little Endian and Big Endians platforms.
-- Writing of binary STL file was wrong (on Unix).
-- Adding a new default parameter in StlAPI::Writer about STL mode (ascii or binary, ascii is the default)
-- Modified Draw command in writestl (from XSDRAWSTLVRML) to be able to write binary STL files (which is more efficient than ascii mode for big triangulations).

-- Author        : GG
-- Study/CSR     : 
-- Debug         : 
-- Improvements  : GG
--  >>>    IMP171201  Material management
--         Enable to treat "UserDefined" materials
--         Any PHYSICAL material is redefined as "UserDefined" material soon
--         any change is done in his properties
--         (ambiant, diffuse, specular, emissive, ... parameters)
--         This name can be change by the user as an owner material name.
--         See: Graphic3d_NOM_UserDefined.
--         Note that GENERIC materials are not affected by this rule (i.e plastic)
--         excepted if the user wants to change his name.
--         Many thanks to Stephane ROUTELOUS for this improvment
--           * package Graphic3d
--             @ In Graphic3d_MaterialAspect,
--               add NEW methods :
--         SetMaterialName ( me    : in out;
--                           AName : CString from Standard )
--                 is static;
--         ---Level: Public
--         ---Purpose: The current matarial become a "UserDefined" material.
--         --          Set the name of the "UserDefined" material.
--         MaterialName(me)
--             returns CString from Standard;
--         ---Purpose:
--         -- Returns the name of this material

-- Author        : atp
-- Study/CSR     : Bug OCC44 Serious misinformation in documentation for TCollection_IndexedDataMap::Add 
-- Debug         : 
-- Improvements  : 
-- News          : 
-- Deletions     : 
-- Impact        : cdl
-- Comments      : The doc says:
--         -- .... If the key was already in the
--         -- map the previous item is replaced by <I>.

-- This may lead to incorrect work of many algorithms in OpenCASCADE.
-- I suggest to correct the documentation and perform the search of usage of this
-- function. This search might clear some not yet registered bugs.

  TKEAMesh.t (Updated) :  
----
-- Author        : SAN, SLN, MSV, AGV (integrated by ABV)
-- Study/CSR     : RINA LH3D-3H Project
-- Debug         : Eliminated memory leak (cyclic dependence of Handles) in MeshKernel
-- Improvements  : HashCode for elements and nodes now computed from their ID rather than 
--                 co-ordinates, thus HashCode is not changed when geometry is modified
--                 Visualisation is extended to support different colours of elements and 
--                 different colours of 2 sides of 2d element
--                 Possibility to hide selected elements and/or nodes introduced
-- News          : Support of 0d elements introduced

Report 5314_rep - 07/10/05 16:29 from workbench cascheck (xxxxx)
------------

  Graphic3d.p (Updated) :  
----
    Modified  :  Graphic3d_TextureRoot.cxx 1.8
-- Author        : abv (Andrey BETENEV)
-- Study/CSR     : OCC10059
-- Debug         : Possibility to initialize texture by dynamically created image
-- Improvements  : 
-- News          : 
-- Deletions     : 
-- Impact        : 
-- Comments      : This improvement has been provided by Fracois Lauzon, who is both support
-- customer and active community member. See for instance Forum thread 8823:
-- http://www.opencascade.org/org/forum/thread_8823
-- The matter is that currently root class managing textures in OCC
-- (Graphic3d_TextureRoot) requires that path to bitmap file was provided to its
-- constructor, and unavoidably makes attempt to load it. Naturally, if there are
-- no such file, exception is raised. This makes it hardly possible to generate
-- textures dynamically at runtime.
-- The fix is provided
-- Note that this fix is needed for us to be able to satisfy requirements of:
-- - MTWZ support customer (to fulfill currently opened query)
-- - MAHR support customer (to be able to propose answer to his request)
-- - RINA SD customer (to be able to provide expected behaviour of mesh
-- presentation, see OCC9915)
